name: Occupation begins
summary: Ammon Bundy leads armed militia in occupation of the Malheur National Wildlife Refuge.

name: One dead, Ammon Bundy and others surrender
summary: LaVoy Finicum, spokesperson for the militia, was killed during a shootout with FBI agents. Bundy and others arrested while en route to community meeting.

name: Remaining militia members surrender to authorities
summary: After 41 days of occupation, the remaining holdouts surrender to authorities.

name: Trial of Ammon Bundy and other militia begins
summary: Bundy and others plead not guilty on charges of conspiracy.

name: Ammon Bundy and others found not guilty
summary: The verdict by a jury of peers shocks many, including the defendants themselves.
